entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 1:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 early this evening then light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
